title: Russian Invasion Makes a Logistical Hub of a Small Ukrainian City
sub_head: Volunteers in Vynohradiv move aid shipments from Romania to ‘places where they really need it.’
body:
Vynohradiv, Ukraine
Ukrainian lawmaker Roksolana Pidlasa married her longtime boyfriend on March 5, the week after war began. Twenty minutes after they exchanged vows, she was back at work overseeing the arrival of humanitarian aid at a storage facility. “I had to—someone had to unload the boxes,” she says.
